title: [20w12a] 函数里的tellraw空格显示错误
author: 阡喏
txt_content: 如题，将命令粘贴到游戏里，然后在游戏里使用空格就可以正常显示了

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
阡喏 发表于 2020-3-22 23:56




image.png (89.32 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-23 00:02 上传






请使用 utf 没有 bom 的格式保存

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 所以是什么样的命令呢

replies.author: 阡喏
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-22 23:55
所以是什么样的命令呢tellraw @p [{"text":"==============================
","color":"gold","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":"             ","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":"游戏时间

","color":"gold","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":"[10min]","color":"dark_aqua","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":" ","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":"[15min]","color":"dark_aqua","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":" ","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":"[20min]
","color":"dark_aqua","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":"      ","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":"[25min]","color":"dark_aqua","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":"     ","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"text":"[30min]","color":"dark_aqua","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false}]复制代码

replies.author: 阡喏
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-23 00:03
请使用 utf 没有 bom 的格式保存
好吧= =，我原本用without BOM的编写了一次，不行，现在切了其他格式再切回去就好了
